//About Us section About Us Sellah is an online marketplace focused on bringing the power of real-time video to Consumer-to-Consumer (C2C) online shopping. We believe in democratizing eCommerce and providingclever technology to allow small sellers to grow fast.Using Sellah, sellers can demonstrate items in real-time and take questions from prospective buyers, creating trust (and more sales!).\n\n Based in Singapore, Sellahaims to serve all of Southeast Asia, a region home to 641 millionconsumers with an online shopping sector expected to reach US$200 billion in value by 2025. The average Southeast Asian spends 3.6 hours per day on their mobile devices so Sellah is designed to be mobile first - we enable users to buy and sell anything at any place and time. Today, over 175,000 people use Sellah’s community in Singapore to buy and sell products.\n\n Sellah will expand rapidly across the Southeast Asia region delivering products and services as unique as the people who sell them.
Saving Consumer-to-Consumer (C2C) online shopping C2C online shopping faces major problems – namely lack of customer trust and product information. By introducing real-time video to C2C, Sellah is solving these challenges. When using Sellah, customers can talk to buyers in real-time, ask questions, enjoy product demonstrations and have discussions in a collective group – this creates trust in the product and the person selling it. After the transaction, customers can give feedback and rate sellers – providing reassurance for future buyers.
What’s in a name? Sellah’s name comes from the word ‘Sell’ and the Singaporean English phrase ‘Lah’ which is usually placed at the end of sentences for emphasis or reassurance. This name was suggested by our sellers and pays tribute to our home, Singapore. Members of our community are lovingly known as ‘Sellahs’.
Media Kit
Please click here to download our Media Kit. For press queries please contact us at press@sellah.com.
